name: You Should Run
description:
YSR: You Should Run is a new type of endless runner mixing arcade and mystery.

And is the beginning of a double trilogy series.

Take place in a near future working for Hidrometric Labs , your objective is test your new product the Propulsion module engine in a virtual reality simulation system.

-5 Stages.

-5 Cars.

-Intuitive/Fun Gameplay.

-Featuring awesome eletronic soundtracks.

-Plus Alpha Stage and Car.
